name: Inky Dream
description:
On Inky Dream you are in the eyes of an artist/writer which is defining his new story, help him create the missing pieces for his magnum opus.

Draw

Draw the missing pieces of the story like enemies, environment props and share your drawings with everyone!

Fight

Fight your own creations with the bullets you also created!

Art - Juan Pablo Posada Noreña

Programmer -  Miguel Ángel Hoyos Ramírez

Audio Designer - Juan José Ospina Ortega (Aka Chucho)
